short_summary: For the supply and delivery of firewood to Elk Island National Park, Alberta
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. For the supply and delivery of firewood to Elk Island National Park, Alberta as per the specifications herein. PERIOD: The Standing Offer will be effective from date of award to 2024-03-31, with the option to extend the term of the Standing Offer by up to two (2) additional years.
tags: Firewood suppporting documents and bid submission via Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys.
full_summary:
=================

**Title:** Standing Offer for Firewood for Elk Island National Park, Alberta
### English:
////////////
#### Request for Standing Offer
#### Competitive Open Bidding
#### Firewood for Elk Island National Park, Alberta

### French:
////////////
#### Demande d’offre à commandes
#### Demandes concurrentielles ouvertes
#### Bois de chauffage pour le parc national Elk Island (Alberta)

**Reference Number:** WS3904908897-Doc3912232054
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** WS3904908897

**Tender Details**

**Publication Date**: May 5, 2023
**Closing Date**: May 31, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
**Contract Effective Date**: May 1, 2023
**Contract Expiration Date**: March 31, 2024 (with option for extension for up to two (2) years)

**Notice Information**
• **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15678856?extsite=MTU2Nzg4NTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15678856?extsite=MTU2Nzg4NTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
• **Contact**: Brent Peters (SPAC/PSPC), brent.peters@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Supply and Delivery Terms**
• **Supply**: Firewood for Elk Island National Park, Alberta
• **Delivery**: Firewood shall be delivered to the specified date and location as outlined in the Tender Documents.

**Additional Requirements**
• **Standing Offer Period**: The Standing Offer will be effective for a period of one (1) year, with an option to extend for up to two (2) additional years.
• **Selection Criteria**: Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

**Trade Agreements**

• **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
• **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
• **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement**
• **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
• **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
• **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**

**Regions of Opportunity/ Regions of Delivery**

• **Alberta
